word:
(1881) 4T 574
     275. To some it is a temptation too strong to be resisted to see others eat the third meal, and they imagine they are 
                                                                           177
hungry, when the feeling is not a call of the stomach for food, but a desire of the mind that has not been fortified with firm principle, and disciplined to self-denial. 
     [FOR CONTEXT SEE--260]
